Texto: 
child small for age.
images from a small bowel follow through show a normal small bowel mucosal pattern. the proximal large bowel through the slpenic flexure also has a normal mucosal pattern.  

the descending and sigmoid colon are abnormal with a loss of the normal haustral markings. this is an early appearance of a lead pipe colon.
ulcerative colitis
ulcerative colitis
crohn's disease
normal
bloody diarrhea with a family history of crohn's disease.
